title: Best of The Herd: 05/16/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/16/2019
description:
Colin says that this Warriors dynasty is actually better than we think and has the data to prove it.  He says Wednesday night proved Kawhi is a one-and-done in Toronto.  Plus, 3x Super Bowl Champion Mark Schlereth questions whether Odell Beckham Jr. is more concerned with his brand or with winning.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
